# Uniform

mean(x)

hist(x)
hist(runif(100000))

x <-runif(100,min=1,max=7)
hist(x,breaks=0:8)
0:8

# Density function.
dunif(4,1,7)
punif(0,1,7)
punif(7,1,7)
punif(4,1,7)

punif(3,min=1,max=7) - punif(2,1,7)

pnorm(1.5)

pnorm(-1.5,lower.tail=FALSE)

# the 68%
pnorm(1)-pnorm(-1)
pnorm(-6,lower.tail=TRUE)+pnorm(6,lower.tail=FALSE)

pnorm(5.5,mean=5,sd=2)
